author: Jessica Hamzelou
title: UK's scientific advice on coronavirus is a cause for concern
description: The UK government has published details of the scientific advice behind its strategies to tackle the covid-19 outbreak, but outside experts say it is missing key points and hasn't been implemented properly
content:
By Jessica Hamzelou
The UK saw large crowds last weekend, despite advice to practise social distancing
Peter Summers/Getty Images
As the covid-19 pandemic rages on, governments around the world are turning to teams of scientists for guidance on how to proc… [+4348 chars]
